en.sc2: If the node to insert after is the tail, we call addLast(15).
en.sc3: Otherwise, we create a new node with the value 15.
en.sc4: Set the new node's prev field to point to node.
en.sc5: Set the new node's next field to point to the node's next field.
en.sc6: Set the node's next field to point to the new node.
en.sc7: Set the node after the new node's prev field to point to the new node.
en.sc8: Increase the list size by 1. This operation is O(1)!
